channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Please help me with this... On my server I cannot do somethings that are important to the game...
E.g:Open doors, Pick up items, ( only at times ) Climb Ladders, Search Creats, Boxes,... Ect. Ect. Ect...
What do I need to do?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 06:56:17 AM[/size][hr]..

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @c_h_r_i_s c h r i s
item.description:
@c_h_r_i_s wrote:

thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Open up client.java

Search for:

"pickup"

Replace that with:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

There you go.

-Mrquarter

Read full topic

item.title: Need help

item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Climbing, searching, and opening doors you have to code yourself. It’s very difficult though.

-Mrquarter
